DOC.brief_title: Whether Dexmedetomidine Can Improve Prognosis Elderly Patients With Postoperative Cognitive Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: 1. collection case : This trail approve Hospital Ethics Committee , patient participate study sign informed consent . The subject select 150 elder patient ( age ≥65 year ) routine tumor surgery , American Society Anesthesiologists classification-Ⅲ . Preoperative liver kidney function , blood electrolyte normal range . 2 . Case group : Selected case divide right dexmedetomidine group control group computer randomly , 75 patient group . Dexmedetomidine group ( A group ) analgesia pump formula : fentanyl 100ug + dexmedetomidine 150 ug , 0.9 % saline dilute 150ml . Control group ( group C ) postoperative analgesia formula : fentanyl 150ug , 0.9 % saline dilute 150ml . Two group anesthesia program . Venous blood serum take surgery , end surgery postoperative analgesia medication run ( postoperative day 4 ) test apolipoprotein E , Amyloid-β1-42 , Amyloid-β1-40 , N-terminal pro B-type natriuretic peptide . 3 . Post operative delirium postoperative cognitive dysfunction diagnosis : Patients complete neuropsychological test entry study-generally day surgery-and discharge hospital 1 week . The investigator assess delirium Confusion Assessment Method intense care unit . The neuropsychological test include Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale-Revised China Visual Reproduction、Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale-Revised China Digit Span、Digit-Symbol Substitution Test、The Stroop Color-Word Test、Trail Making Test A Trail Making Test B . Patients cognitive dysfunction two Z score individual test combine Z score 1.96 .
